channel.title: Friends
channel.description: I have been trying for the last month to get my friends to be able to join my server, and all people have done is taken my money and helped me pretty much with nothing. I don't have any rsgp to give or an account. Please just someone help me, I am tired of being the only one on my server!!

item.title: Friends
item.dc:creator: @UndeadDino UndeadDino
item.description:
@UndeadDino wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:2, topic:444261”]1. Why did you give them money if they didn’t help.
2. Help is FREE on these forums.
3. What exactly do you need help with, you need to be more specific. What is the problem?[/quote]

It was rs cash, not real life. My friend tries to join using mopar, but it kicks him right away and says on my Source Client “Invalid Server - Wagapalooza.no-ip.biz”
I have portforwarded and everything. I have checked it multiple times. If you can help me my skype is smelly.santa, and I also have tv if you prefer.

Read full topic
